subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Two goals by Cristiano Ronaldo helped Real Madrid defeat Getafe, 4-1, but Gareth Bale sat out after sustaining an injury during warm-ups at Madrid’s Santiago Bernabéu stadium.
snippet: Two goals by Cristiano Ronaldo helped Real Madrid defeat Getafe, 4-1, but Gareth Bale sat out after sustaining an injury during warm-ups at Madrid’s Santiago Bernabéu stadium.
